message.body: Can I ask for your side of what happened last night?
i left with andrew before anything happened, so "my side" is what nar said, which i believe.
I have no idea how to feel. I'm so lost and I wish you were here.

it is confusing, but at least she's being honest. because she cares about you, and he does too. and you'll be leaving soon and if you have to, you can just push it out of your mind. are you still going to see nakul? how do you feel about that?
No, Nakul and I broke up like a month ago, and you couldn't pay me to see him at this point. The only downside is that I now have to spend a week in Delhi by my
self. And yeah, I'll probably be over it in a week or two, if I know myself at all. It just seems really awful right now because I was already in the middle of
a mental breakdown when I found out
i think you're right, and that's a very mature way of seeing things. i hope you'll try and help nar to understand that... she's really upset right now, too.
